ModMetaData.name: Pawn Render Patch for HD
ModMetaData.author: sdknm2
ModMetaData.description:
pawn rendering of RimWorld 1.3+ is changed from old. even the pawn has HD texture, it will be shown as low resolution in world.
this mod will make the pawn use old rendering on it is near to camera. when you are watching the pawn in far range, it will use new rendering from 1.3
